title: Risk/Trust Policy Configuration Schema (P-01)
description: Defines the mandatory structure and constraints for all validated P-01 Trust Calculus configurations, used by ConfigValidator (GRCM).

trustDecayFactor.description: The rate at which accrued trust decays over time (0 < x < 1).

riskMitigationWeight.description: Weight applied to external risk mitigation factors (0 <= x <= 1).

trustThresholds.description: Defines boundary values for operational states.

serviceWeights.description: Weights assigned to different contributory service scores.
